about_short_description.short_description: Novocarbo is a carbon removal company built by business professionals with a legacy of passion for soil & agriculture.

product.name: Biochar Carbon Removal
product.description: Processes biomass through pyrolysis into biochar, binding and storing carbon, which can then be added to agricultural soil or concrete, generating Carbon Removal Certificates.

product.name: Carbon Removal Certificates
product.description: Certificates generated when biochar is added to a permanent carbon sink, representing the amount of CO2 safely extracted and can be traded on voluntary carbon markets.

product.name: Heat as a Service
product.description: Provides renewable and climate-neutral heat to companies and municipal utilities without upfront investment, using surplus energy from the pyrolysis process.

product.name: Carbon Removal Parks
product.description: Operates parks that remove over 6,000 tonnes of CO2 per park, using pyrolysis technology to process plant residues into biochar and generate renewable energy.
